msg: for symmetry and namespace protection, make the toolbox param-name key 'org.apache.velocity.toolbox'

author: nbubna
msg: Pull all relevant VelocityServlet code up into VVS and make it extend HttpServlet directly
pull toolbox setup out of init() into its own initToolbox()
(in other words, the only accepted param-name for your velocity.properties is 'org.apache.velocity.properties')
oh, and i pulled up the relevant javadoc from VelocityServlet as well

msg: add example src files from old directory structure
